description:
To thank the group for all their hard work in the past, Shirase invites the party to enjoy the sunny beach. While enjoying the wonderful weather and pristine waters, and accident causes Masato to lose all his memories, including those of Mamako!
Source: FUNimation

titles.title: Do You Love Your Mom on the Shore?
Namiuchigiwa no Okaasan wa Suki Desuka?
在海岸邊的媽媽 你喜歡嗎？
波打ち際のお母さんは好きですか?
